name: Bronze – Process Boost
description: Initial Process Assessment: Identify key bottlenecks and inefficiencies. Streamlined Solutions: Recommendations for quick wins. Process Documentation: Documented workflows for future reference.

name: Silver – Data Insights
description: Everything in Bronze; Basic data analytics & KPI setup; Monthly performance report; Change management guidance.

name: Gold – Project Excellence
description: Everything in Silver; Full project planning & coordination; Risk assessment & mitigation; Bi-weekly progress meetings.

name: Platinum – Enterprise Transformation
description: Everything in Gold; Leadership coaching & team alignment; Advanced analytics dashboards; Post-project performance review & improvement plan.

name: Apple Screen Repair
description: Screen Replacement – Genuine or high-quality compatible screens for iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Diagnostic Check – Full device inspection to ensure no hidden issues. Touch & Display Calibration – Ensures smooth touch response and accurate color. Protective Screen Guard – Complimentary tempered glass for extra protection. Warranty Coverage – 30 days on parts. Same-Day Service – Fast turnaround for most models.
features: Screen replacement for iPhone, iPad & Mac
